title: 713 - Jeremy Bearimy | Good Place to Sleep S3 E5
description:
Your timeline for sleep is approaching and drifting by while my meanders take a cursive shape that carries you away.


(You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new websitehttp://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 22:00)


Make sure to listen to Season 3 of "Within the Wires”- Within the Wires is a fiction podcast that tells its story through found audio from an alternate universe.- Season 3, which just started, is a political thriller set in 1950s Chicago told exclusively through dictated letters and notes from a bureaucrat to his secretary.- Every season takes place in the same universe, but you can start in at season 3 without missing a beat.- Past seasons told stories through relaxation tapes and museum audio guides.- Find Within the Wires in your favorite podcast app, or at withinthewires.com.


Tonight’s show is sponsored by Quip! The sensitive sonic toothbrush I have been using for over two years (not over and over! Changing out the brush heads every three months!)Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://www.getquip.com/sleep, you get your first refill pack for FREE with a quip electric toothbrush.
